document.full_text: the idaho senate on wednesday approved a measure that would ban most abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy and subject abortion providers who violate the ban to criminal prosecution and lawsuits.
document.title: idaho senate approves ban on abortions after 20 weeks
lines_and_colors: the idaho senate on wednesday approved a measure that would ban most abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy and subject abortion providers who violate the ban to criminal prosecution and lawsuits.
